code: import React from"react";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import{Button,ArrowLeft}from"@components/library";import"./index.sass";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{useTranslation}from"@helpers/translate";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TopBalance=()=>{const location=useLocation();const{realWallet}=useSelector(state=>state.wallet);const{__}=useTranslation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-balance",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-balance__wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-balance__left",children:[location.pathname!=="/wallet"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/wallet",className:"top-balance__link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowLeft,{className:"top-balance__link-icon"}),__("wallet.back")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"top-balance__title",children:__("wallet.available_balance")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-balance__right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"top-balance__balance",children:[realWallet.balance,"$"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"top-balance__trade-btn",color:"orange",size:"mini-w",to:"/",type:"link",children:__("wallet.trade")})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-balance__list-btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{to:"/wallet/deposit",className:"top-balance__btn",color:"border",size:"mini-w",type:"link",children:__("wallet.deposit")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{to:"/wallet/withdrawal",className:"top-balance__btn",color:"border",size:"mini-w",type:"link",children:__("wallet.withdrawal")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{to:"/wallet",className:"top-balance__btn ".concat(location.pathname==="/wallet"?"":"disabled"),color:"border",size:"mini-w",type:"link",children:__("wallet.transaction_history")})]})]});};export default TopBalance;
